Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-26007 affecting package python-cryptography for versions less than 42.0.5-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-26007 affecting package python-cryptography for versions less than 42.0.5-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-cryptography is earlier than 42.0.5-4, affected by CVE-2026-26007
